tool_description: Customizes invoice branding elements including company logo, colors, fonts, and contact information for consistent brand presentation.

company_name.description: Company name to display on invoice

logo_url.description: URL or path to company logo image

primary_color.description: Primary brand color in hex format

secondary_color.description: Secondary brand color in hex format

error_messages: Invalid color format: Colors must be in hex format (#RRGGBB). Provide valid hex color codes.
Logo file not accessible: The specified logo URL or path cannot be accessed. Verify the logo location and permissions.
Font not available: The specified font family is not available. Choose from available font options.
Invalid email format: Company email address format is invalid. Provide a valid email address.
Missing required information: Company name, address, phone, and email are required for invoice branding.
usage: Provide required company information (name, address, phone, email) and optionally customize visual elements like logo, colors, and fonts to match brand guidelines.

branding_elements.description: Compiled branding elements ready for invoice integration

logo_settings.description: Logo display settings and positioning information

color_scheme.description: Applied color scheme for invoice elements

company_info_block.description: Formatted company information block for invoice header
